movies.title: Das serbische Mädchen
movies.plot: The naive 18 year old Dobrila leaves her little Serbian village to travel to Hamburg, Germany, where her boyfriend lives. The trip is not easy. Finally in Hamburg she has to realize her boyfriend is not very interested in a relationship. She doesn't tell him she's pregnant and starts on her way home to Serbia, which turns out to be even more exhausting.
movies.simplePlot: The naive 18 year old Dobrila leaves her little Serbian village to travel to Hamburg, Germany, where her boyfriend lives. The trip is not easy. Finally in Hamburg she has to realize her ...

biography.bio: Mirjana Jokovic was born on November 24, 1967 in Belgrade, Serbia, Yugoslavia. She is an actress, known for Underground (1995), Vukovar Poste Restante (1994) and Zaboravljeni (1988). She is married to Srdjan Milenkovic.
biography.name: Mirjana Jokovic

biography.bio: Ben Becker was born on December 19, 1964 in Bremen, Germany. He is an actor and director, known for The Harmonists (1997), Gloomy Sunday (1999) and Frère sommeil (1995). He has been married to Anne Seidel since September 2012. They have one child.
biography.name: Ben Becker

biography.bio: Pascal Breuer was born on July 26, 1966 in Munich, Germany. He is known for his work on Underworld (2003), Das serbische Mädchen (1991) and Ein Ferienhaus in Schottland (2008).
biography.name: Pascal Breuer

biography.bio: Vladimir Torbica was born on February 29, 1956 in Belgrade, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He is an assistant director and actor, known for Das Traumschiff (1981), Flashback (2000) and L'Amérique des autres (1995).
biography.name: Vladimir Torbica

biography.bio: Joachim Regelien was born on June 25, 1941 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor, known for Ohne Nachsicht (1972), Das serbische Mädchen (1991) and Qui est cette femme? (2004).
biography.name: Joachim Regelien

biography.bio: Peter Carsten was born on April 30, 1928 in Weißenburg, Bavaria, Germany as Peter Ramsentaler. He was an actor and producer, known for Dark of the Sun (1968), The Quiller Memorandum (1966) and Stalingrad: Dogs, Do You Want to Live Forever? (1959). He was married to Lilijana and Divna. He died on April 20, 2012 in Lucija, Slovenia.
biography.name: Peter Carsten

biography.bio: Volker Prechtel was born on August 9, 1941 in Hopfen am See, Bavaria, Germany. He was an actor, known for The Name of the Rose (1986), Une famille en Bavière (1989) and The Enigma of Kaspar Hauser (1974). He died on August 7, 1997 in Gröbenzell, Bavaria.
biography.name: Volker Prechtel

biography.bio: Martin Maria Abram was born on May 9, 1948. He is an actor, known for 13 Minutes (2015), The Holy Land of Tyrol (2010) and Leni (1994).
biography.name: Martin Maria Abram

biography.bio: Borut Alujevic was born on May 16, 1942 in Ljubljana, Slovenia. He is an actor, known for Das serbische Mädchen (1991), Return of Spring (1978) and Heretic (1986).
biography.name: Borut Alujevic

biography.bio: Werner Asam was born on October 17, 1944 in Mallersdorf, Germany. He is an actor and director, known for Une famille en Bavière (1989), Querelle (1982) and Heidi und Erni (1990).
biography.name: Werner Asam

biography.bio: Joachim Bauer was born on August 11, 1956 in Miesbach, Germany. He is an actor, known for Idomeneo (1990), La mort de Maria Malibran (1972) and La Bible de sang (2013).
biography.name: Joachim Bauer

biography.bio: Ivan Bekjarev was born on April 6, 1946 in Belgrade, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor and writer, known for Jelena (2004), Baril de poudre (1998) and Bolji zivot (1987).
biography.name: Ivan Bekjarev

biography.bio: Karl Exner is an actor, known for Das serbische Mädchen (1991).
biography.name: Karl Exner

biography.bio: Axel Ganz was born in 1951. He is an actor, known for Le roi de la Chine (1984), Rhinegold (1978) and Je veux seulement que vous m'aimiez (1976).
biography.name: Axel Ganz

biography.bio: Karl-Friedrich Gerster was born in 1932. He is an actor, known for Barschel: A Murder in Geneva (1993), Der Indianer (1988) and Der Geist der Mirabelle. Geschichten von Bollerup (1978).
biography.name: Karl-Friedrich Gerster
